channel.title: CVE Feed for Scott Paterson -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Scott Paterson -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24395|2024-08-02T10:56:03.867Z -- scott%20paterson -- contact%20form%207%20redirect%20%26%20thank%20you%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Scott Paterson Contact Form 7 Redirect & Thank You Page plugin <= 1.0.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24405|2024-08-02T10:56:04.126Z -- scott%20paterson -- contact%20form%207%20%E2%80%93%20paypal%20%26%20stripe%20add-on
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Scott Paterson Contact Form 7 – PayPal & Stripe Add-on plugin <= 1.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-51683|2024-06-27T20:40:24.767Z -- scott%20paterson -- easy%20paypal%20%26%20stripe%20buy%20now%20button
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Scott Paterson Easy PayPal & Stripe Buy Now Button.This issue affects Easy PayPal & Stripe Buy Now Button: from n/a through 1.8.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-29130|2024-06-04T17:57:34.823Z -- scott%20paterson -- contact%20form%207%20%E2%80%93%20paypal%20%26%20stripe%20add-on
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Scott Paterson Contact Form 7 – PayPal & Stripe Add-on allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Contact Form 7 – PayPal & Stripe Add-on: from n/a through 2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51683|2024-02-28T16:45:07.490Z -- scott%20paterson -- easy%20paypal%20%26%20stripe%20buy%20now%20button
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Scott Paterson Easy PayPal & Stripe Buy Now Button.This issue affects Easy PayPal & Stripe Buy Now Button: from n/a through 1.8.1.
